title: Fallen
description: In this Dateline classic, when a pastor loses two wives in suspicious accidents, authorities begin to wonder if it was terrible luck or something else. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on February 8, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
